document_data.name: Dusk Unicorn
document_data.mainbody: A '''dusk unicorn''' was a rare breed of [[unicorn]]. Some fey believed that the birth of one was an auspicious omen.
document_data.Description:
Unlike regular unicorns, dusk unicorns possessed a dark coat and mane and a black horn.
<!--==Behavior==-->
document_data.Abilities: Dusk unicorns, like other unicorns, could heal other creatures by touching them with their horn. Additionally, a dusk unicorn possessed a further two unusual magical abilities: they could manifest a group of [[dancing lights]] that drew other creatures towards the light, and they could teleport themselves or a group of allies up to {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Combat:
Dusk unicorns wielded their hooves and their horn as weapons; in particular, charging into an enemy horn-first was an effective tactic of theirs.
<!--==Ecology==
